description: The technology company has been locked in a battle over whether to unlock the iPhone of one of the attackers in the San Bernardino shooting.
title: The Apple-F.B.I. Case
title_page: The Apple-F.B.I. Case - The New York Times
maintext:
Filing to Drop Case Against Apple
The Justice Department said that it had found a way to unlock an iPhone without help from Apple, allowing the agency to withdraw its legal effort to compel the company to assist in a mass-shooting investigation.
